    • Uses of Net in de.jannlab.core

      Classes in de.jannlab.core that implement Net 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BidirectionalNetBase
      This class is a specific implementation for bidirectional networks.
      class  FeedForwardNetBase
      This class is to implement feed-forwards networks.
      class  NetBase
      This class is an abstract base-class for all different implementations in this framework.
      class  OfflineRecurrentNetBase
      This is a implementation for offline computing RNNs.
      class  OnlineRecurrentNetBase
      This is a implementation for online computing RNNs.
      class  RecurrentNetBase
      This is an abstract inter class for other recurrent network types.
